hp.special: 50 + 10 per cada nivell per sobre de 5

trait.name: Shared Resistances
entries: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. Tens resistència al dany the chosen type mentre duri el conjur.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragon uses its Breath Weapon, and it makes a number of Bite and Claw attacks equal to half the spell's level (arrodoneix a la baixa).

action.name: Bite and Claw
entries: {@atk mw} el teu modificador d'atac de conjurs a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} de dany perforant.

action.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The dragon exhales a stream of multicolored energy en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa. Si falla, rep {@damage 2d6} damage of your choice of a damage type this dragon has resistance to; si supera, en rep la meitat.
